subject: Order# ssn4332
description_text:
Hi,
I open my order this morning, and while the quality of the S1 wheel is fantastic,  I am missing one of the quick releases that I ordered. The invoice isn't clear that there should have been two QR. Attached are pictures of my invoice and the website showing prices with 2 QR.

I am hoping a QR can been shipped ASAP.

Thank you.

Jon Harbour

conversations.body_text: Hi Jon Harbour,  It should be a misdescription by our operations staff: each steering wheel only requires one quick-release, and the quick-release itself cannot be damaged, as one is sufficient.

Hi,  the order I placed was for two quick release  devices.   I have a different wheel that I want an additional quick release.


________________________________
Hi Jon Harbour,  This was most likely missed by our warehouse. I have arranged for a quick-release unit to be shipped to you immediately tomorrow. Please rest assured.

Thank you so much. I really appreciate your great customer service.  Have a great day.


________________________________
Hi Jon Harbour,      Sorry for the delayed response. Here's your resend link.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211755404     Happy New Year!
